value.title: Automatic Page Refresh (APR) in the Power BI Desktop with SQL Server DirectQuery Mode
value.excerpt: In this session, we will discuss the new rolled out feature in the Power BI October 2019 update. Make sure before you proceed further, you have the latest version of the Power BI Desktop installed in your machine. value.title: The Best Way to Install Power BI Desktop
